name: Sushi Ninja (itch)
description:
Game Overview

You are a hungry ninja searching for sushi and must venture through a whimsical forest to finally satisfy your sushi craving. 

In this whimsically themed 2D platform game, you must venture through five levels, filled with various enemies, platforms, and clouds to finally reach the sushi at the end. Through running, jumping, and pushing objects around, this challenging experience tests your skills as a true ninja.

Credits

I created the level design, generated the aesthetic of the game, and scripted the button UI. The game objects, mechanics, and all other scripts were developed by Professor David Cohen. The art assets and music are from the asset store and other free online resources.

Created by Angelia Wu
